metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3597 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle VM VirtualBox component in Oracle Virtualization VirtualBox before 5.0.26 allows local users to affect availability via vectors related to Core.

criterions.comment: virtualbox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
